structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Department Of Early Education And Care

law.catch_line: Entry And Inspection Of Facilities; Court Order
law.text: Upon petition of the department, the superior court shall have jurisdiction to enter an order permitting the department to enter and inspect, under conditions that the court considers appropriate, a facility operated by a person whom the department has reasonable cause to believe is subject to licensure or approval under this chapter.
